page.title: 02GEOGRAPHICAL LOCATION
page.content: Woodhall Spa has a population of some 2500 and is located in the East Lindsey district of Lincolnshire,lying almost centrally within the county.The area is mainly rural with farming being an important occupation.The city of Lincoln lies 19 miles away with the market towns of Boston being 17 and Horncastle 6 miles distant.The area around the village is mainly flat with the fen lands lying to the south,but to the north the land rises to the hills of the Lincolnshire Wolds. The village began as a spa and this, together with its unpolluted air,has led to it being registered as one of the four healthiest places in Britain. This has attracted many to retire to the village and there are now numerous homes for the elderly.
